snippet: Mr. Atkins, formerly of Discovery Communications, will succeed Stephen Friedman, who has been at MTV since 2008.
abstract: Viacom announces hiring of Sean Atkins as president of MTV division, which has struggled to adapt to trend in which young viewers are abandoning traditional television; Atkins will take over from Stephen Friedman.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Atkins, formerly of Discovery Communications, will succeed Stephen Friedman, who has been at MTV since 2008.

headline.main: Viacom Names Sean Atkins Head of MTV
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Digital Executive at Discovery Is Appointed President of MTV
